# Balanced Match

... [other content continues here] ...

If the `str` contains more `a` than `b` / there are unmatched pairs, the first match that was closed will be used. For example, {% raw %}`{{a}`{% endraw %} will match `['{', 'a', '']` and {% raw %}`{a}}`{% endraw %} will match `['', 'a', [...]

... [other content continues here] ...  

If the `str` contains more `a` than `b` / there are unmatched pairs, the first match that was closed will be used. For example, {% raw %}`{{a}`{% endraw %} will match `[ 1, 3 ]` and {% raw %}`{a}}`{% endraw %} will match `[0, 2]`. ...
